document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
105 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , KUMN , ZMUK , NSPU , ZMUM , IMC ) from 18 provinces were studied.
Cherkasy Prov.
:
2 spec. ( ZMUK ) Kaniv , Reserve , Zarichchya Island ,
on
Rumex
,
11.vi.1949
;
1 spec. ( ZMUK ) idem,
on
Rumex haplorhizus
,
20.vi.1958
;
1 spec. ( ZMUK ) Zarichchya Island , Globova leg.,
5.v.1947
;

Dnipro Prov .: 1 spec. (photo observation, UkrBIN ID 31426), Pavlohrad, 48.489637 , 35.944774 , observed by B. Loboda, 4.v.2008 ;
Kherson Prov.
: 4 spec. ( KUMN ) environs of Tsiurupynsk , M. Sheygas leg.,
10.v.1996
;
6 spec. ( SIZK ) Bylozerka Bilozerka Distr. , Olexandrivka , Lyman coast,
on
Rumex crispus , S.V. Volovnik
leg.,
22.v.1982
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Hola Pristan Distr. , Burkuty ,
31.v.1951
;
1 spec. ( ZMUM ) Kherson , A.N. Romanov leg.,
24– 30.vi.1934
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Novotroitsk Distr. , Vasylivka , Churyuk Island , Solodovnikova leg.,
24.v.1966
;

25.vi.1965
; Kropyvnytskyi Prov. :

23.vi.1955
;

: 2 spec. ( SIZK ) Pervomaysk Distr. , Kuripchino , M. Nesterov leg.,
28.v.1980
;

,
1 f ( SIZK ) Pervomaysk Distr. , Chausove ,
on

, left bank of Yuzhny Buh, S. V . Volovnik leg.,
24.iv.1983
;

:
3 spec. ( ZIN ) Lokachy Distr. , Markovychy , Olsufyev leg., A. Yakovlev collection;
